choose.title: Choose a property
choose.description: Browse available properties or let Noor find one for you.

invest.title: Invest
invest.description: From 2,000 AED. Any amount based on your goals.

own.title: Become an owner
own.description: Receive your title deed and ownership certificate. Real property, registered in Dubai.

trade.title: Sell or keep
trade.description: Resell your shares on the marketplace whenever you want, or keep them.

reccos.name: RECCOS ‚Äî Simple access to real estate ownership
reccos.desc: RECCOS allows anyone to invest in Dubai's booming real estate market from as little as AED 2,000 by buying real, registered property fractions. You become a co-owner of a tangible asset with full transparency and traceability of your share.

ownership.name: Real and certified ownership
ownership.desc: Every RECCOS property is officially registered in Dubai. When you invest, you receive a title deed and an ownership certificate corresponding to your contribution. You don't hold a digital promise ‚Äî you hold a legal, verifiable proof of ownership.

marketplace.name: An open and liquid marketplace
marketplace.desc: The RECCOS Marketplace lets you buy or resell your shares freely, depending on your goals. You can exit whenever you wish, without waiting for the global sale of the property, and take advantage of real-time market appreciation.

noor.name: Noor ‚Äî your intelligent personal assistant
noor.desc: Noor is your dedicated AI assistant. She searches for properties that match your goals, automates recurring investments, and can act on your behalf when the right opportunity appears. If you authorize monthly investments, Noor finds the best balance between potential and stability, managing your capital with precision and transparency.

whyDubai.name: Why Dubai ?
whyDubai.desc: Dubai's real estate market continues to break records: 2024: AED 761 billion in transactions (+27 % YoY). H1 2025: AED 431 billion in deals (+26 % in volume). Over 90,000 active investors yearly. A stable, global hub offering growth, liquidity, and international accessibility ‚Äî the ideal environment for fractional ownership.

howItWorks.name: How it works ?
howItWorks.desc: Choose a property ‚Äî or let Noor find one for you. Invest any amount from AED 2,000 upward. Track your ownership and market updates in real time. Resell your shares anytime through the RECCOS Marketplace. A seamless digital experience, with no complex paperwork.

security.name: Security, transparency, and peace of mind
security.desc: Every property is legally registered, and all documents are verifiable and accessible. RECCOS ensures total transparency of ownership, transactions, and records. Your assets are protected, your ownership is documented, and your peace of mind is our priority.

featuredLaunch.title: Emerald Dunes | Palm West
featuredLaunch.description: A levitating penthouse with 1,800 m¬≤ of terraces, a suspended mirror pool, and a 270¬∞ panoramic suite. Private access to the RECCOS Sky Club and 24/7 Gulfstream concierge.

newsletter.title: Stay updated with RECCOS
newsletter.description: Receive the latest updates, exclusive launches, and insights about Dubai's real estate market.

globalHub.title: A Global Hub Between Europe, Asia and Africa
globalHub.subtitle: The Geographic Edge
globalHub.description: The UAE sits at one of the world's most strategic crossroads, connecting Europe, Asia and Africa within a few hours' flight. This position makes the country a global logistics, aviation and business hub, driving continuous demand for housing, offices and hospitality assets. For investors, this geographic advantage translates into stronger liquidity, higher occupancy and long-term resilience.

diversifying.title: Diversifying Beyond Europe
diversifying.subtitle: Why the UAE Balances a Portfolio
diversifying.description: The UAE offers a powerful diversification route for investors seeking growth outside mature European markets. With strong demographics, rapid infrastructure expansion and a pro-investment environment, it provides exposure to an economy still in full acceleration. This shift reduces concentration risk and positions investors in a high-growth, dollar-anchored market.

masterPlan.title: Dubai Urban Master Plan 2040
masterPlan.subtitle: A City Built for the Future
masterPlan.description: The Dubai 2040 Urban Master Plan is a 20-year roadmap designed to transform Dubai into one of the world's most liveable, modern and future-proof cities. It plans to double green-spaces, massively expand beaches and public spaces, develop an extensive public transport network, and structure five major urban hubs to accommodate a growing population ‚Äî all within a sustainable and highly investable vision. This planning creates a long-term urban investment context: new infrastructure, increased housing needs, predictable land value appreciation and opportunities for mixed-use projects.

fractional.title: Fractional Real Estate Investing
fractional.subtitle: Opening Access to Prime UAE Assets
fractional.description: Fractional ownership enables investors to access high-value properties with a significantly lower entry ticket, while still benefiting from rental yields and capital appreciation. This model democratizes access to premium real estate and aligns with global trends toward liquid, tech-enabled property investment. It also offers diversification across multiple assets rather than concentrating capital into a single unit.

freehold.title: Freehold Ownership in the UAE
freehold.subtitle: What International Investors Need to Know
freehold.description: The UAE allows foreigners to purchase full freehold property in designated zones, granting complete ownership, resale rights and inheritance security. This framework has opened access to some of the country's fastest-growing districts and premium developments. Freehold legislation remains a major catalyst for foreign investment and long-term confidence in the market.

goldenVisa.title: Golden Visa & Residency
goldenVisa.subtitle: Investing to Anchor Yourself in the UAE
goldenVisa.description: The UAE offers long-term residency pathways for investors, entrepreneurs and highly skilled individuals through its Golden Visa program. This framework provides 10-year renewable residency, freedom to live, work and invest, and a stable long-term horizon for families and assets. By linking investment to residency security, the UAE strengthens investor confidence and supports sustainable capital flows.

tourism.title: High-End Tourism
tourism.subtitle: A Powerful Engine for Real Estate Yields
tourism.description: The UAE attracts tens of millions of visitors each year, positioning itself as a global luxury tourism powerhouse. This constant flow fuels strong demand for holiday rentals, serviced apartments and hospitality-driven investments. With world-class attractions and year-round tourism, short-term rental yields remain among the strongest in the region.

dirhams.title: Investing in Dirhams
dirhams.subtitle: Strong Currency, Balanced Global Exposure
dirhams.description: The UAE dirham (AED) is one of the world's most stable currencies, firmly pegged to the US dollar since 1997. This stability protects investors from major FX volatility while offering exposure to a fast-growing, globally connected economy. For international investors, AED-denominated assets provide both security and diversification within a dollar-anchored framework.

legalFramework.title: Legal Framework & Transparency
legalFramework.subtitle: Understanding RERA and the Regulators
legalFramework.description: The UAE has built one of the region's most transparent and investor-protective real estate environments, led by regulators such as RERA. Clear laws, escrow protections and strict developer oversight ensure safer transactions and long-term market confidence. This robust regulatory framework is a key pillar attracting global investors seeking stability and transparency.

offPlan.title: Off-Plan Property
offPlan.subtitle: Opportunities, Risks and Best Practices
offPlan.description: Off-plan real estate remains one of the UAE's most dynamic investment segments, offering accessible entry prices and strong capital appreciation potential. With phased payments and early access to emerging districts, investors can capture value before delivery. Understanding developer reputation, escrow regulations and project timelines is essential for securing safe, high-return opportunities.

population.title: Population Growth
population.subtitle: A Rental Demand in Constant Expansion
population.description: The UAE's population is growing rapidly, driven by global talent inflows, business expansion and government strategies to attract skilled residents. This demographic momentum fuels continuous demand for rentals, short-term stays and new residential developments. For investors, it creates a stable, long-term base of occupancy and strong potential for both yield and appreciation.

security.title: Security, Stability and Visibility
security.subtitle: The UAE's Winning Trio
security.description: The UAE stands out for its exceptional political stability, ultra-low crime rates and long-term national planning, creating a uniquely predictable environment. Investors benefit from a country built on safety, transparency and continuity ‚Äî rare strengths in today's global landscape. This combination of stability and forward vision makes the UAE one of the most secure destinations for capital preservation and growth.

globalCapital.title: The UAE, a Magnet for Global Capital?
globalCapital.subtitle: A True Investment Hub
globalCapital.description: The UAE has evolved into a true global capital magnet, driven by unmatched political stability and a pro-investor economic model. With 0% personal income tax and full foreign ownership across key sectors, the country offers one of the world's most attractive investment environments. Its world-class infrastructure, fast-growing population and long-term national visions create sustained demand and long-term value.

taxAdvantages.title: Tax Advantages
taxAdvantages.subtitle: Understanding the UAE Fiscal Framework
taxAdvantages.description: The UAE offers one of the world's most attractive fiscal environments, with 0% personal income tax, no capital gains tax for individuals, and full profit repatriation. Corporate tax remains low and strategically designed to keep the country competitive while supporting global businesses. This predictable, stable and investor-friendly framework is a major driver of long-term investment flows into the Emirates.
